DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text describing the complete set of actions and observations designed to generate data, with the ultimate goal of discovery or hypothesis testing.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data, with the ultimate goal of discovery or hypothesis testing._Including everything._The act of working out the form of something (as by making a sketch or outline or plan) or the result of this activity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A set of actions and observations, performed to verify or falsify a hypothesis or research a causal relationship between phenomena.

Concepts.definition: A coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data, with the ultimate goal of discovery or hypothesis testing.

Property.preferredDefinition: Including everything.:The act of working out the form of something (as by making a sketch or outline or plan) or the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: The act of working out the form of something (as by making a sketch or outline or plan) or the result of this activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

DataElementConcept.origin: MCL:Molecular and Cellular Characterization of Screened Lesions
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/19/18 jk Released per PI/Maureen at Oct 2018 Steering Comm meeting.   3/7/18 jk created for MCL Genomics data.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._Text; the words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual entities required by NCI operations and systems. Includes administrative, financial, organizational and quasi-scientific concepts required for NCI operations and systems.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Description; a statement that represents something in words.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ValueDomain.origin: NAACCR:North American Association of Central Cancer Registries
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 11/19/18 jk  added Qualified reg status w/concurrence of Mary; added MCL CSI reference.
